ast.name: Japan travel Guide
ast.comment:
The idea for my app comes from my goal of traveling overseas first stop Japan. I have seen and used a lot of apps on both android and IOS systems that are guides to traveling.

i want this h\app to have several "pages" with information for a westerner that is planing to travel to Japan.

Accommodation : will have information about the types of accommodation in japan with some pictures.

Traditional food: information about traditional foods. i want to have at least one from each of the cities but if i run out of time i will combine all into one page.

Gallery:  a picture slideshow with pictures from japan showing off the sites. if i have time and if its possible ill put backing music.

Main Menu: this is the main navigation for the app. navigation through sprite buttons.

about: where i will reference all my information and pictures.

General: has some random facts about japan. with 3 navigation buttons.

tourist attractions: shows pictures of the popular things to see and do in japan such as snowboarding.

i wanted to create many pages and tap sprite to push but when you go to add the board to the new page it crashes the app, so for now i will do it in a bit of a messy way (removing and adding sprites) which i have a feeling that it might be the only way to do it since i decided to use a board. i will keep investigating how i could do this with pages.

the Prep functions clear the board of sprites and sets up for the main menu or a new page.

just encountered a problem with the prep functions. i might have to create a separate functions to remove sprites for certain pages. i could fix this if there is a clear board code.     i don't know how it it fixed itself ? i wonder if this will be a problem on the export

i only found clear sprite set.. i haven't used sprite sets as i don't know enough about them to use it .

with the translation code i plan to put the user input part in its own section so i can have a picture that looks like a box for the translation to sit in.. i believe there will be a problem if one was to translate a paragraph of text i haven't figured out how to wrap text yet.  i wonder if there is a way to limit the characters the users can input with wall ask string.

if i get time i will create the play button for the translation. as it is hard to hit the even on the text.

i have tested this on the phone and found that the menuReturn button is kinda small for fingers and that the navigation 123 buttons are also kind of small. i might swap out the 123 for a next button and clear the events each time . im not so sure how well that will work.

body.text: setting up the board and the logo
tap the sprites to change the menu.
all buttons work and have return button on them
at the moment General and Phrases have content
shows text on board and 3 navigation buttons to change the text
this page will have the traditional foods of the main cities along with a picture
this code will have all the main tourist attractions and must sees of japan with a few pictures
this will have some helpful phrases that are a must when in a country with a different language.
i will have it in the format :
ENGLISH             good morning
JAPANESE           "Ohayo"
SOUND                     >
tap the text to go to the translator. i will replace with a graphic in the apps style
this page just has info about the types of accommodation
i might include pictures aswell
also a link to an online site to book a hotel
i hope to have a sideshow on this page .
i will aim to have this done for the final submission
but first i need to find a way to do it
this will include all my reference links
no title picture yet
button as sub
tap the translate button to insert text for a translation.
tap the speaker button to hear the translation spoken
